20 class PID:
21  """! класс PID регулятора"""
22 
23  def __init__(self, Kp, Ki, Kd):
24  """! конструктор класса PID
25  @param Kp пропорциональный коэффициент
26  @param Ki интегральный коэффициент
27  @param Kd дифференциальный коэффициент
28  """
29  self.prev_error = 0
30  self.proportional = 0
31  self.integral = 0
32  self.derivative = 0
33  self.Kp = Kp
34  self.Ki = Ki
35  self.Kd = Kd
36 
37  self.target = 0
38 
39  @staticmethod
40  def constrain(value, lower_limit, higher_limit):
41  """! ограничивает значение в заданных пределах
42  @param value значение
43  @param lower_limit нижняя граница
44  @param higher_limit верхняя граница
45  @return ограниченное значение
46  """
47 
48  if value < lower_limit: value = lower_limit
49  if value > higher_limit: value = higher_limit
50  return value
51 
52  def control(self, current, dt):
53  """! вычисление управляющего воздействия
54  @param current текущее значение управляемого параметра
55  @param dt период дискретизации
56  @return значение управляющего воздействия
57  """
58 
59  dt = dt.to_sec()
60  error = float(current - self.target)
61  self.proportional = error * self.Kp
62  self.integral += PID.constrain(error * dt * self.Ki, -100, 100)
63  self.derivative = (error - self.prev_error) / dt * self.Kd
64  self.prev_error = error
65  return PID.constrain(self.proportional + self.integral + self.derivative, -100, 100)
66 
67  def break_pid(self):
68  """! сбросить управляющее воздействие"""
69 
70  self.proportional = 0
71  self.integral = 0
72  self.derivative = 0
73 
74  def set_target(self, target):
75  """! установить целевое значение управляемого параметра
76  @param target целевое значение управляемого параметра
77  """
78 
79  if target != self.target:
80  self.break_pid
81  self.target = target
82 
83  def set_gains(self, P, I, D):
84  """! установить коэффициенты регулятора
85  @param P пропорциональный коэффициент
86  @param I интегральный коэффициент
87  @param D дифференциальный коэффициент
88  """
89 
90  self.Kp = P
91  self.Ki = I
92  self.Kd = D

104  self.serial_frame = {
105  "header": 0x55,
106  "len": 8,
107  "data": [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0],
108  "crc": 0
109  }

112  self.power_hand = Int16()
113  # rospy.Subscriber("esp", Joystick, self.control_callback)
114  joystick_subscriber = message_filters.Subscriber("joystick_state", Joystick)
115  navigation_subscriber = message_filters.Subscriber("navigation_module", PoseStamped)
116  self.ts = message_filters.TimeSynchronizer([joystick_subscriber, navigation_subscriber], 10)
117  self.ts.registerCallback(self.control_callback)
118  # self.pid_roll = PID(2, 0, 0)

122  self.pid_pitch = PID(pitch_gains['P'], pitch_gains['I'], pitch_gains['D'])
123  # self.pid_yaw = PID(2, 0, 0)
124  self.pid_depth = PID(depth_gains['P'], depth_gains['I'], depth_gains['D'])

127  self.pid_yaml = "/home/ubuntu/drone_ros/src/drone/config/pid.yaml"
128 
129  self.t = rospy.Time.now()

131  def save_yaml(self):
132  """! сохранить значения сервера параметров в файл"""
133 
134  import yaml
135 
136  with open(self.oceanic_yaml, 'r') as f:
137  oceanic = yaml.safe_load(f)
138 
139  oceanic["vertical_left"]["reversed"] = rospy.get_param("/vertical_left")["reversed"]
140  oceanic["vertical_right"]["reversed"] = rospy.get_param("/vertical_right")["reversed"]
141  oceanic["horizontal_left"]["reversed"] = rospy.get_param("/horizontal_left")["reversed"]
142  oceanic["horizontal_right"]["reversed"] = rospy.get_param("/horizontal_right")["reversed"]
143  oceanic["vertical_back"]["reversed"] = rospy.get_param("/vertical_back")["reversed"]
144 
145  with open(self.oceanic_yaml, 'w') as f:
146  yaml.dump(oceanic, f, default_flow_style=False)
147 
148  with open(self.pid_yaml, 'r') as f:
149  pid = yaml.safe_load(f)
150 
151  pid["PidPitch"]["P"] = rospy.get_param("/PidPitch")["P"]
152  pid["PidPitch"]["I"] = rospy.get_param("/PidPitch")["I"]
153  pid["PidPitch"]["D"] = rospy.get_param("/PidPitch")["D"]
154  pid["PidDepth"]["P"] = rospy.get_param("/PidDepth")["P"]
155  pid["PidDepth"]["I"] = rospy.get_param("/PidDepth")["I"]
156  pid["PidDepth"]["D"] = rospy.get_param("/PidDepth")["D"]
157 
158  with open(self.pid_yaml, 'w') as f:
159  yaml.dump(pid, f, default_flow_style=False)

161 
162  @staticmethod
163  def map(x, in_min, in_max, out_min, out_max):
164  """! преобразование значение из одного диапазона в другой
165  @param x входящее значение
166  @param in_min минимальное значение входящего диапазона
167  @param in_max максимальное значение входящего диапазона
168  @param out_min минимальное значение выходящего диапазона
169  @param out_max минимальное значение выходящего диапазона
170  @return выходящее значение
171  """
172 
173  return int((x - in_min) * (out_max - out_min) / (in_max - in_min) + out_min)
174 
175  @staticmethod
176  def constrain(x, higher_limit, lower_limit):
177  """! ограничивает значение в заданных пределах
178  @param value значение
179  @param lower_limit нижняя граница
180  @param higher_limit верхняя граница
181  @return ограниченное значение
182  """
183 
184  if x > higher_limit: x = higher_limit
185  if x < lower_limit: x = lower_limit
186  return x
187 
188  def control_callback(self, joystick_msg, navigation_msg):
189  """! коллбэк на получение сообщений из топиков
190  /joystick_state и /navigation_state. Чтение данных с пульта
191  и с модуля навигации. Обработка информации. Передача управляющих
192  сигналов на arduino через usb и на руку-хват в топик /pub_hand.
193  @param joystick_msg сообщение drone/Joystick.msg
194  @param navigation_msg сообщение geometry_msgs/PoseStamped.msg
195  """
196 
197  short_buttons = joystick_msg.Short
198  long_buttons = joystick_msg.Long
199  pressed_buttons = joystick_msg.pressed_buttons
200 
201  A_active = bool((pressed_buttons >> 0) & 0b0000000000000001)
202  D_active = bool((pressed_buttons >> 3) & 0b0000000000000001)
203  R_active = bool((pressed_buttons >> 8) & 0b0000000000000001)
204  L_active = bool((pressed_buttons >> 7) & 0b0000000000000001)
205 
206  if A_active:
207  self.power_hand.data = 1148
208  elif D_active:
209  self.power_hand.data = 1832
210  else:
211  self.power_hand.data = 1484
212 
213  speed_mode = joystick_msg.SpeedMode
214  light_mode = joystick_msg.LightMode
215 
216  lx = Control.map(joystick_msg.left_x, 0, 1023, -100, 100)
217  ly = Control.map(joystick_msg.left_y, 0, 1023, -100, 100)
218  rx = Control.map(joystick_msg.right_x, 0, 1023, -100, 100)
219  ry = Control.map(joystick_msg.right_y, 0, 1023, -100, 100)
220 
221  divisor = 1
222  if speed_mode == 0:
223  divisor = 0.3
224  elif speed_mode == 1:
225  divisor = 0.6
226  elif speed_mode == 2:
227  divisor = 1
228 
229  stabilization_on = not (joystick_msg.State & 0b00000001)
230  self.powers_msg.lock = (joystick_msg.State & 0b00000010) >> 1
231  self.serial_frame["data"][6] = self.powers_msg.lock
232  yaw_on = (joystick_msg.State & 0b00001000) >> 3
233  tangage_on = (joystick_msg.State & 0b00010000) >> 4
234 
235  lx = int(lx * divisor) if tangage_on else 0
236  ly = int(ly * divisor)
237  rx = int(rx * divisor) if yaw_on else 0
238  ry = int(ry * divisor)
239 
240  # State
241  # 00000000 - 0 - lock on, stabilization off, tangage off
242  # 00000001 - 1 - lock on, stabilization on, tangage off
243  # 00000010 - 2 - lock off, stabilization off, tangage off
244  # 00000011 - 3 - lock off, stabilization on, tangage off
245  # 00010000 - 16 - lock on, stabilization off, tangage on
246  # 00010001 - 17 - lock on, stabilization on, tangage on
247  # 00010010 - 18 - lock off, stabilization off, tangage on
248  # 00010011 - 19 - lock off, stabilization on, tangage on
249 
250  # if light_mode == 0:
251  # self.powers_msg.Light_pwm = 0
252  # elif light_mode == 1:
253  # self.powers_msg.Light_pwm = 1000
254  # elif light_mode == 2:
255  # self.powers_msg.Light_pwm = 1500
256  # elif light_mode == 3:
257  # self.powers_msg.Light_pwm = 2000
258 
259  self.serial_frame["data"][5] = light_mode
260 
261  pitch, roll, yaw = euler_from_quaternion([
262  navigation_msg.pose.orientation.x,
263  navigation_msg.pose.orientation.y,
264  navigation_msg.pose.orientation.z,
265  navigation_msg.pose.orientation.w
266  ])
267 
268  roll = roll * 57.2958
269  pitch = pitch * 57.2958
270  yaw = yaw * 57.2958
271 
272  q0 = navigation_msg.pose.orientation.w
273  q1 = navigation_msg.pose.orientation.x
274  q2 = navigation_msg.pose.orientation.y
275  q3 = navigation_msg.pose.orientation.z
276 
277 
278  dt = rospy.Time.now() - self.t
279 
280 
281  vertical_left_params = rospy.get_param('vertical_left')
282  vertical_right_params = rospy.get_param('vertical_right')
283  horizontal_left_params = rospy.get_param('horizontal_left')
284  horizontal_right_params = rospy.get_param('horizontal_right')
285  vertical_back_params = rospy.get_param('vertical_back')
286 
287  vertical_left_direction = -1 if vertical_left_params["reversed"] else 1
288  vertical_right_direction = -1 if vertical_right_params["reversed"] else 1
289  horizontal_left_direction = -1 if horizontal_left_params["reversed"] else 1
290  horizontal_right_direction = -1 if horizontal_right_params["reversed"] else 1
291  vertical_back_direction = -1 if vertical_back_params["reversed"] else 1
292 
293  depth_gains = rospy.get_param('PidDepth')
294  pitch_gains = rospy.get_param('PidPitch')
295  self.pid_depth.set_gains(depth_gains['P'], depth_gains['I'], depth_gains['D'])
296  self.pid_pitch.set_gains(pitch_gains['P'], pitch_gains['I'], pitch_gains['D'])
297  self.pid_depth.set_target(depth_gains['target'])
298  self.pid_pitch.set_target(pitch_gains['target'])
299 
300  if stabilization_on:
301  if lx in range(-12, 13) and ly in range(-12, 13):
302  pitch_power = self.pid_pitch.control(pitch, dt)
303  depth_power = -self.pid_depth.control(navigation_msg.pose.position.z, dt)
304  # depth_power = 0
305  # rospy.loginfo("depth_power %f | pitch_power %f, pitch %f" , depth_power , pitch_power, pitch)
306  print(round(pitch, 2), round(pitch_power, 2), round(depth_power, 2))
307  left_alt_pwm = depth_power + pitch_power
308  right_alt_pwm = depth_power + pitch_power
309  back_alt_pwm = depth_power - pitch_power
310 
311  self.serial_frame["data"][0] = left_alt_pwm
312  self.serial_frame["data"][1] = right_alt_pwm
313  self.serial_frame["data"][4] = back_alt_pwm
314  else:
315  left_alt_pwm = ly + lx
316  right_alt_pwm = ly + lx
317  back_alt_pwm = ly - lx
318 
319  self.serial_frame["data"][0] = left_alt_pwm
320  self.serial_frame["data"][1] = right_alt_pwm
321  self.serial_frame["data"][4] = back_alt_pwm
322 
323  # self.pid_roll.set_target(roll)
324  # self.pid_pitch.set_target(0)
325  # self.pid_yaw.set_target(yaw)
326  # self.pid_depth.set_target(navigation_msg.pose.position.z)
327  self.pid_pitch.break_pid()
328  self.pid_depth.break_pid()
329 
330  else:
331  self.pid_pitch.break_pid()
332  self.pid_depth.break_pid()
333  left_alt_pwm = ly + lx
334  right_alt_pwm = ly + lx
335  back_alt_pwm = ly - lx
336 
337  self.serial_frame["data"][0] = left_alt_pwm
338  self.serial_frame["data"][1] = right_alt_pwm
339  self.serial_frame["data"][4] = back_alt_pwm
340 
341  left_heading_pwm = ry + rx
342  right_heading_pwm = ry - rx
343 
344  self.serial_frame["data"][2] = left_heading_pwm
345  self.serial_frame["data"][3] = right_heading_pwm
346 
347  self.serial_frame["data"][0] = Control.constrain(int(self.serial_frame["data"][0] * vertical_right_direction * 0.84), 100, -100) # d3 motor3
348  self.serial_frame["data"][1] = Control.constrain(int(self.serial_frame["data"][1] * vertical_left_direction * 0.84), 100, -100) # d5 motor4
349  self.serial_frame["data"][2] = Control.constrain(int(self.serial_frame["data"][2] * horizontal_right_direction), 100, -100) # d6 motor1
350  self.serial_frame["data"][3] = Control.constrain(int(self.serial_frame["data"][3] * horizontal_left_direction), 100, -100) # d9 motor2
351  self.serial_frame["data"][4] = Control.constrain(int(self.serial_frame["data"][4] * vertical_back_direction), 100, -100) # d10 motor5
352 
353  print(self.serial_frame["data"])
354 
355  self.t = rospy.Time.now()
356 
357  def run(self):
358  """! запуск системы управления"""
359 
360  rate = rospy.Rate(10)
361  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
362  try:
363  self.serial_frame["crc"] = 0
364  for i in range(self.serial_frame["len"]):
365  self.serial_frame["crc"] = self.serial_frame["crc"] ^ (int(self.serial_frame["data"][i]) & 0b11111111)
366  #print(self.serial_frame["crc"])
367  msg = struct.pack(
368  "2B5b4B",
369  self.serial_frame["header"],
370  self.serial_frame["len"],
371  self.serial_frame["data"][0],
372  self.serial_frame["data"][1],
373  self.serial_frame["data"][2],
374  self.serial_frame["data"][3],
375  self.serial_frame["data"][4],
376  self.serial_frame["data"][5],
377  self.serial_frame["data"][6],
378  self.serial_frame["data"][7],
379  self.serial_frame["crc"]
380  )
381  self.arduino.write(msg)
382  self.pub_hand.publish(self.power_hand)
383  rate.sleep()
384  except rospy.ROSException as e:
385  rospy.logerr(e)
386  rospy.loginfo(e)
387  except rospy.ROSSerializationException as e:
388  rospy.logerrr(e)
389  except rospy.ROSInitException as e:
390  rospy.logerr(e)
391  except rospy.ROSInterruptException as e:
392  rospy.logerr(e)
393  except rospy.ROSInternalException as e:
394  rospy.logerr(e)
395  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
396  rospy.logerr(e)
397  except KeyboardInterrupt as e:
398  rospy.loginfo(e)
399  rospy.logerr(e)
400  rospy.loginfo("Out of loop")
401  self.save_yaml()
402  # rospy.spin()
403 
404 
405 if __name__ == '__main__':
406  ctrl = Control()
407  try:
408  rospy.loginfo("START")
409  ctrl.run()
410 
411  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
412  pass
413  # rospy.loginfo("FINISH")
